THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
06.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Fane
CRL.MC.NO. 8541 OF 2019 3 2020/KER/176
ORDER
Dated this the 06 day of January, 2020

The petitioners are accused in S.C.No. 6/2017 on the
file of the Additional Assistant Sessions Court, Palakkad for
having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections
341, 324, 326, 435 and 308 read with Section 34 of the IPC. The
only injured is the 2" respondent who has appeared through
counsel and filed affidavit to the effect that the matter has been
amicably settled with the petitioners and that he does not have
any grievance. The injury sustained is not life threatening. The
petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. A report has
been filed by the Investigating Officer through the learned Senior
Public Prosecutor to the effect.

In the result, the Crl.MC is allowed and the entire
proceedings as against the petitioners herein in S.C.No. 6/2017
on the file of the Additional Assistant Sessions Court, Palakkad
and Crime.No.603/2015 of Nenmara Police Station stand quashed

Fane
CRL.MC.NO. 8541 OF 2019 3 2020/KER/176
ORDER
Dated this the 06 day of January, 2020

The petitioners are accused in S.C.No. 6/2017 on the
file of the Additional Assistant Sessions Court, Palakkad for
having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections
341, 324, 326, 435 and 308 read with Section 34 of the IPC. The
only injured is the 2" respondent who has appeared through
counsel and filed affidavit to the effect that the matter has been
amicably settled with the petitioners and that he does not have
any grievance. The injury sustained is not life threatening. The
petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. A report has
been filed by the Investigating Officer through the learned Senior
Public Prosecutor to the effect.

In the result, the Crl.MC is allowed and the entire
proceedings as against the petitioners herein in S.C.No. 6/2017
on the file of the Additional Assistant Sessions Court, Palakkad
and Crime.No.603/2015 of Nenmara Police Station stand quashed
under Section 482 of the Cr.PC and the petitioner/accused are
discharged.

Sd/-
ASHOK MENON
JUDGE
